desc:
This energy W-Engine, modded from spare parts of a truck's engine, converts the original cylinder into an energy storage unit, which is highly advantageous. It placed first in the internal Leaps and Bounds competition, surpassing many heavy-duty motorbikes and even a truck driven by Piper herself.

<color=#959595>"Too bad there's no way to carry cargo... Maybe we can hang it on the tusks?" â€” Piper, top-notch logistics driver</color>
desc2: Equip to increase Anomaly Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: An energy W-Engine modded from spare parts of a truck's engine. It converts the original cylinder into an energy storage unit, which is highly advantageous.
